ValidationRule.description: SSSW Prevent Agent from changing the Case Owner, unless the Status has also been changed (as completed by System Changes)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, 'Service_Agent'), $UserRole.DeveloperName = 'UnifiedAgent' ) && ISCHANGED(OwnerId) && (PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) = $User.Id && (IsHLC__c || IsCR__c ) && NOT(CONTAINS(OwnerId,"00G"))) && NOT(ISCHANGED(Status)) && NOT(Bypass_Data_enforcement__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your Role does not allow you to reassign the Case Owner. Please talk to your manager to reassign this Case.
